message: Hi Bob, I propose we split it 60-40 in my favor. Given the inflation rates, this seems fair to start with. What do you think?
Hi Alice, I propose we split it 50-50. This way we both get a fair share and avoid losing value due to inflation!

Hi Bob, I appreciate your offer for a 50-50 split, but considering the higher inflation rate on your side, I believe we should adjust the split to better reflect the decreasing value of the money for you. How about we try a 55-45 split in my favor this round?
Hi Bob, given the higher inflation rate affecting your share, I propose a 55-45 split in my favor. This should help balance out the value loss for you. What do you say?
